about_the_game:
Full Bundle Content:

  • Tier VI Premium American T78 tank destroyer
  • Garage slot
  • Crew including a Commander with any zero perk of choice
  • 500,000 credits
  • 3 days of WoT Premium Account
  • Unique crew member Alexandra Ostrovskaya with Brothers in Arms as a zero perk and enough XP for one extra skill
  • Unique crew member Holly Byron with Brothers in Arms as a zero perk and enough XP for one extra skill
  • Armored Train 2D style
  • x3 Portrait of Alexandra decal
  • x3 Portrait of Holly decal
  • x3 Lieutenant Gingerbread Man decal

Swift and deadly—these words define the T78 best of all. Coming with the Elusive Menace DLC, this nimble Tier VI American tank destroyer is ready to cause a lot of trouble for the unfortunate enemies who happen to encounter it on the battlefield. Good alpha damage and great gun depression angles topped up with decent maneuverability and fully traversable turret makes the T78 a well-rounded tank destroyer capable of dealing with various battle challenges. Watch out for enemy shells though—with such thin armor, every hit you take will be a hard one.

Firepower: The T78’s 90 mm gun deals a respectable 240 HP of damage per shot, and its 160 mm of penetration allows you to put that damage output to good use. With a rather comfortable reload time of 8.3 seconds, you can easily punish enemy vehicles that dare to enter your view range. Gun depression angles of –10°/+20° allow you to effectively utilize the terrain and remain out of range of your opponents’ shells. And don’t forget the fully traversable turret, giving you that extra flexibility and maneuverability in the battle.

Speed: Speaking of maneuverability, this vehicle performs pretty well in those “catch me if you can” scenarios on the battlefield. Find a nice firing spot, rain down some shells on the enemy force, and move on to the next position, using your top speed of 55 km/h. Use your mobility to your advantage and stay elusive and dangerous.

Protection: Don’t count on this vehicle’s armor. Your best protection is to remain unseen by the enemy—reposition quickly, hide in the bushes, use the terrain, and remember that you have great signal range, which means that you can stay on the second or even third line of the battle, sniping the opponents spotted by your allies.

The vehicle comes with a 100% trained crew and a commander with Sixth Sense, as well as some additional treats—projection decals to decorate your vehicles for Christmas, the Armored Train 2D style, and two unique crew members—Alexandra Ostrovskaya and Holly Byron—each with Brothers in Arms as a zero perk and enough XP for one extra skill of your choice. To help you progress faster in the game, the bundle also includes 500,000 credits and 3 days of WoT Premium Account.

DLC can be added to your World of Tanks account only once.
You will be able to use this DLC only if you play from the game account created on Steam.

name: World of Tanks — Elusive Menace Pack

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: World of Tanks - Elusive Menace Pack - $29.99

package_groups.title: Buy World of Tanks — Elusive Menace Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11 – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium E2180 / AMD Athlon 64 X2 4200+
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 / ATI Radeon HD 4550
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11 – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (Desktop)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2 GB) / Radeon HD 7850 (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 70 GB available space

supported_languages:

*languages with full audio support
